column1: # This TSV file provides equivalence mapping to handle languages for which
# we may not have specific rules
# Indian languages not directly handled by the Indic NLP tool
# Those with Latin script are mapped to English
aym spa     # Aymara (seems to use ? like in Spanish)
que spa     # Quecha (seems to use ? like in Spanish)
# low-resource languages other than Latin script
amh amh     # Amharic, Ge'ez script (rule based)
khm khm     # Khmer, Khmer script (rule based)
tir tir     # Tigrinya, Ge'ez script (rule based)
# new languages part of the 200 set
# bod handled by special tokenizer for Tibt
# dzo in Tibt script handled by tokenizer for Tibt
# shn handled by burmese tokenizer as it's in mymr script
